charges.description: WHILE ON-DUTY, WRONGFULLY USED HER POSITION AS A MEMBER OF THE SERVICE TO INFLUENCE THE INVESTIGATION AND/OR RESULTS OF AN INCIDENT.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (45 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE ON-DUTY, WRONGFULLY FAILED TO TRANSMIT VIA DEPARTMENT RADIO HER HAVING RESPONDED TO A REPORT OF MOTOR VEHICLE ACCIDENT INVOLVING A METROPOLITAN TRANSIT AUTHORITY BUS AND AN OFF-DUTY MEMBER OF THE SERVICE, HER ACTIVITIES AT THE ACCIDENT SCENE, AND ANY DISPOSITION OF THE DEPARTMENT's INVOLVEMENT IN THE INCIDENT.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (45 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE ON-DUTY, WRONGFULLY FAILED TO CONDUCT A PROPER INVESTIGATION AND DIRECTED A POLICE OFFICER UNDER HER SUPERVISION TO PREPARE A COMPLAINT REPORT CHARGING A MOTORIST WITH "HARASSMENT IN THE 2ND DEGREE" WHEN NO SUCH OFFENSE HAD OCCURRED.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (45 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE ON-DUTY, WRONGFULLY FAILED TO MAKE REQUIRED ENTRIES IN HER ACTIVITY LOG.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (45 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE ON-DUTY, WRONGFULLY FAILED TO MAKE REQUIRED ENTRIES IN HER ACTIVITY LOG, AND HAVING COMMITTED MISCONDUCT, WRONGFULLY FAILED TO NOTIFY THE DESK OFFICER, PRECINCT OF OCCURRENCE, AND THE INTERNAL AFFAIRS BUREAU COMMAND CENTER, AS REQUIRED.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (45 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE ON-DUTY,  WRONGFULLY FAILED TO PREPARE OR TO DIRECT THE PREPARATION OF A POLICE ACCIDENT REPORT, AS REQUIRED.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (45 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE ON-DUTY, WRONGFULLY IMPEDED AN OFFICIAL INVESTIGATION REGARDING AN ACCIDENT.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (45 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE ON-DUTY, WRONGFULLY IMPEDED AN OFFICIAL DEPARTMENT INVESTIGATION.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (45 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE ON-DUTY, WRONGFULLY IMPEDED AN OFFICIAL DEPARTMENT INVESTIGATION CONDUCTED BY MEMBERS OF THE PATROL BOROUGH MANHATTAN NORTH INVESTIGATIONS UNIT BY MAKING MISLEADING OR OTHERWISE INACCURATE STATEMENTS DURING OFFICIAL INTERVIEWS.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (45 day(s) )

charges.description: FAILED TO PREPARE A COMPLAINT REPORT WORKSHEET UPON RESPONDING TO THE SCENE OF CRIMINAL ACTIVITES REPORTED BY A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT.
ATTEMPTED TO CONVINCE OR WAS COMPLICIT IN ATTEMPTING TO CONVINCE A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT TO DISCONTINUE EFFORTS TO REPORT A PAST CRIME.
FAILED TO PREPARE A COMPLAINT REPORT WORKSHEET UPON RESPO9NDING TO THE SCENE OF CRIMINAL ACTIVITIES REPORTED BY A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENTS.
ATTEMPTED TO CONVINCE OR WAS COMPLICIT IN ATTEMPTING TO CONVINCE A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT TO DISCONTINUE EFFORTS TO REPORT A PAST CRIME.
MADE ONE OR MORE MISLEADING STATEMENTS AT AN OFFICIAL DEPARTMENT INTERVIEW CONCERNING HIS INERACTIONS WITH ONE OR MORE COMPLAINANTS.
MADE ONE OR MORE INACCURATE, INCOMPLETE AND OR MISLEADING STATEMENTS IN HIS ACTIVITY LOG CONCERNING ONE OR MORE REPORTED PAST CRIMES.
FAILED TO IDENTIFY HIMSELF AS A MEMBER OF THE DEPARTMENT TO AN ON-DUTY POLICE OFFICER DURING AN OFF-DUTY INCIDENT.
DID WRONGFULLY MAKE COMPUTER INQUIRIES UNRELATED TO THE OFFICIAL BUSINESS OF THE DEPARTMENT ON A DEPARTMENT COMPUTER.

charges.description: WHILE ON DUTY FAILED TO CORRECT A PAID DETAIL SUBMISSION THAT HAD INACCURATE TIME WORKED ENTRIES UPON BECOMING AWARE OF THE ERROR.
WHILE ON DUTY ON ONE (1) OCCASION DID IMPROPERLY CORRECT OR EDIT HIS ACTIVITY LOG ENTRIES.
VIOLATED PAID DETAIL GUIDELINES BY PERFORMING A PAID DETAIL ASSIGNMENT WITHIN ONE HOUR OF HIS REGULARLY SCHEDULED TOUR.
SUBMITED A PAID DETAIL PAYMENT SLIP FOR HOURS THAT HE DID NOT PERFORM SAID DETAIL.

charges.description: ABUSE HIS AUTHORITY AS A MEMBER OF THE NEW YORK CITY POLICE DEPARTMENT BY THREATENING TO ISSUE A SUMMONS TO PERSONS KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT WITHOUT SUFFICIENT LEGAL AUTHORITY.
ABUSED HIS AUTHORITY AS A MEMBER OF THE NEW YORK CITY POLICE DEPARTMENT BY FAILING TO PROVIDE HIS NAME OR SHIELD NUMBER TO PERSONS KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT UPON REQUEST.
FAILED TO MAINTAIN HIS ACTIVITY LOG IN THAT AFTER AN ENCOUNTER WITH PERSONS KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT SAID POLICE OFFICER FAILED TO MAKE NOTATIONS ABOUT THE ENCOUNTER IN HIS ACTIVTY LOG.
FAILED TO PREPARE A  STOP AND FRISK REPORT.
WHILE OFF-DUTY, SAID POLICE OFFICER DID LEAVE HIS FIREARM UNSECURED IN HIS HOTEL ROOM IN ATLANTIC CITY, NEW JERSEY.
WHILE OFF-DUTY,  SAID POLICE OFFICER DID LEAVE HIS FIREARM UNSECURED IN HIS HOTEL ROOM, IN ATLANTIC CITY, NEW JERSEY, WHILE A CIVILIAN WAS PRESENT IN THE ROOM.
Failed to safeguard a firearm (resulting in loss/theft or not).

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, OPERATED A MOTOR VEHICLE WHILE HIS ABILITY WAS IMPAIRED BY AN INTOXICANT.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), ORDERED BREATH TESTING, PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (31 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (15 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, WRONGFULLY OPERATED A MOTOR VEHICLE WHILE UNDER THE INFLUENCE OF AN INTOXICANT.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), ORDERED BREATH TESTING, PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (31 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (15 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, WRONGFULLY CONSUMED AN INTOXICANT TO THE EXTENT THAT SAID POLICE OFFICER WAS UNFIT FOR DUTY.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), ORDERED BREATH TESTING, PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (31 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (15 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, REFUSED TO SUBMIT TO A BREATHALYZER TEST.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), ORDERED BREATH TESTING, PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (31 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (15 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, AFTER BEING INVOLVED IN A POLICE INCIDENT, FAILED AND NEGLECTED TO IMMEDIATELY NOTIFY THE OPERATIONS UNIT, AS REQUIRED.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), ORDERED BREATH TESTING, PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (31 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (15 day(s) )

charges.description: FAILED TO RESUME PATROL FOR A PERIOD OF APPROXIMATELY ONE HOUR AND THIRTY FIVE MINUTES AFTER ENTERING THE U.S. ARMY CAREER CENTER.
IMPROPER MEMO BOOK ENTRIES.
OBSERVED WRONGFULLY SPEAKING ON A PERSONAL CELLULAR TELEPHONE AFTER EXITING THE U. S. ARMY CAREER CENTER.
WHILE ON-DUTY,  DID FAIL AND NEGLECT TO PREPARE THE REQUIRED ARREST PAPERWORK.
WHILE ON-DUTY, DID FAIL AND NEGLECT TO TAKE POLICE ACTION.
WHILE ON-DUTY,DID WRONGFULLY MAKE IMPROPER ENTRIES IN ACTIVITY LOG.

charges.description: SAID POLICE OFFICE WAS DISCOURTEOUS TO A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT
WHILE ON-DUTY AT A LOCATION KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT IN BRONX COUNTY FAILED TO PROPERLY SAFEGUARD A PRISONER, RESULTING IN SAID PRISONER’S ESCAPE.
while-on duty, failed to notify his Commanding Officer or Executive Officer about a incident that occurred involving Members of the Service.
while on-duty, failed to make a notification to counseling when required to do so.
